name: The Great Danger
description:
This Game was made for Weekly Game Jam - Week 150, Theme: "You're the Enemy" About

The Great Danger is a puzzle-top-down-shooter, where you have to get through guarded lab to destroy important documentation.

Hide from guards' eyes and follow orders to accomplish your goal.

Features
  • 5 puzzle levels that combine mechanics of a top-down-shooter and logic riddles
  •  Collectibles
  •  Secret lore
  •  Dynamic ending that creates message depending on player's achievements
  •  Multiple solutions for levels - each solution's difficulty may vary and change ending screen a bit
Controls MoveWSAD/ArrowKeysPointMouseShootLeft Mouse Button
